backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing user profile management, daily usage tracking, subscription tiers (free/pro), and UTR payment verification with role-based access control via MixinAuthorization and AccessControl modules.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report JSON file with no features listed.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-sentence summaries of all frontend source files, describing their purpose and notable bug fixes (primarily Uint8Array/BlobPart casting issues).
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining CSS custom property tokens for light and dark themes including colors, radius, chart, and sidebar variables.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell for the React SPA titled 'File Utility App' that mounts the app at `#root` and loads `src/main.tsx` as an ES module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app shell with four tabs (Smart Compressor, Universal Converter, Toolbox, Subscription), a LoginHeader, sponsored ad components, a LimitReachedModal, and an AdminPanel route; Pro status is read from UsageContext.
frontend/src/components/AdminPanel.tsx: Admin-only panel that fetches and displays pending UTR submissions with email, UTR ID, timestamp, and principal, providing per-row Approve buttons with optimistic UI feedback.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Simple sticky glassmorphism header displaying the FileForge logo, title, and 'Client-Side Processing' / 'Privacy First' badges; superseded by LoginHeader in the current app.
frontend/src/components/DropZone.tsx: Reusable drag-and-drop file input component that handles drag events and click-to-browse, accepting configurable file types and multiplicity.
frontend/src/components/GlassCard.tsx: Thin wrapper component that applies a `glass-card` CSS class with optional teal glow and click handler to any children.
frontend/src/components/LimitReachedModa: A modal dialog component that appears when a user exhausts their 4 free daily operations, prompting them to upgrade to a Pro subscription plan for â‚¹20/year.
frontend/src/components/LoginHeader.tsx: A sticky header component displaying the FileForge branding, privacy badges, and Internet Identity authentication controls (login/logout with principal ID display).
frontend/src/components/SmartCompressor/: A file compression tool component supporting PDF and image formats, with configurable lossy/lossless options, per-file status tracking, and usage-limit enforcement.
frontend/src/components/SubscriptionPane: A subscription management panel that shows the user's current plan (Free or Pro), handles UPI payment flow via UTR submission, and displays verification status from the backend.
frontend/src/components/Toolbox/Backgrou: A toolbox component that accepts an image file and removes its background using a configurable tolerance slider, with preview toggle and download support.
frontend/src/components/Toolbox/Metadata: A toolbox component that strips EXIF, GPS, and other metadata from uploaded image and PDF files, supporting batch processing with per-file status and download.
frontend/src/components/Toolbox/PDFMerge: React component that allows users to upload, reorder, and merge multiple PDF files into one, with usage limit enforcement and a download option for the merged result.
Container component that renders a tool selector UI for three tools (PDF Merger, Background Remover, Metadata Scrubber) and displays the active tool's panel inside a GlassCard.
frontend/src/components/UniversalConvert: React component that accepts files via drag-and-drop and converts them between formats (PDF, JPG, PNG, WEBP, DOCX, SVG), tracking per-file conversion status and providing download links for results.
frontend/src/contexts/FileContext.tsx: React context that manages a per-tab registry of uploaded files, exposing add, remove, clear, and get operations for tabs like compressor, converter, merger, background, and metadata.
frontend/src/contexts/UsageContext.tsx: React context that tracks daily tool usage against a 4-use limit, syncing counts with the ICP backend when authenticated and falling back to localStorage for anonymous users, with pro-user bypass support.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor using React Query, initializing it with the user's Internet Identity or anonymously, and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Custom hook and provider that manage Internet Identity authentication via DFINITY's AuthClient, exposing login/logout functions, identity state, and login status to the component tree.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for backend actor calls including verification status, UTR submission/approval, pro status, and daily usage queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file setting up Tailwind, custom OKLCH dark theme tokens, glassmorphism utility classes, and a fixed background image with overlay.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a single `cn` utility function that merges Tailwind class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app wrapped in QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/utils/backgroundRemoval.ts: Implements client-side background removal using flood-fill from image corners on a canvas, with edge smoothing via semi-transparent pixels.
frontend/src/utils/compression.ts: Provides image compression utilities supporting lossy/lossless modes with percentage or max-KB targets, using binary search on canvas quality settings.
frontend/src/utils/conversion.ts: Handles file format conversion (JPG, PNG, WEBP, SVG, PDF) using canvas rendering and dynamically loaded pdf.js for PDF-to-image conversion.
frontend/src/utils/metadataScrubber.ts: Strips metadata from images by redrawing on canvas, and from PDFs by clearing all metadata fields via dynamically imported pdf-lib.
frontend/src/utils/pdfMerger.ts: Merges multiple PDF files into a single PDF blob using pdf-lib loaded dynamically from a CDN.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with dark mode, custom OKLCH color palette (teal, violet, chart, sidebar), extended typography/container-query plugins, and custom font families.
project_state.json: Project state manifest (version 25) describing a multi-tab file utility app with glassmorphism design, client-side processing, UPI payment flow, Internet Identity auth, and known/existing features.
